slide1.title: About me
slide1.text1: I studied design in my high school with good results. Then I did some work for some people until a small business was made.
slide1.text2: In the meantime, I did a lot of training, internships and work, I started to be interested in web-code, namely HTML, Javascript and CSS. I did two trainings within the context and how the design course further complemented my knowledge in the area of ​​web design.
slide1.text3: So I created this page in order to get to know me and know what I do.

card1.title: Graphic design
card1.body: Specialized course in logo creation. 1st Stage: F3 - Graphic Entity. 2nd Stage: Agir XXI - Social security service entity.

card2.title: Credit Card and Marketing
card2.body: Studies on Credit Cards and their presentation in marketing.

card3.title: Aerostructure Engineering
card3.local: IEFP - Institute for Employment and Vocational Training + OGMA
card3.body: Knowledge of drilling and driving parts for airplane assembly line. 500h Internship at OGMA.

card4.title: Associations and Youth
card4.local: IEFP - Institute for Employment and Professional Training
card4.body: Knowing how an association is created and knowing how to relate to young people. 420h Internship at Casa de Juventude de Alverca.

card5.title: Admnistrative technician
card5.local: IEFP - Institute for Employment and Professional Training
card5.body: Create document and organize these and know how to process complaints. 420h Internship at COPAM

card6.title: Administrative Technician - Human Resources
card6.body: Process documents and claim management in the company.

card7.title: Computing - Microsoft Academy
card7.local: IEFP - Institute for Employment and Professional Training
card7.body: Knowledge of computerization and Java, Html and CSS code.

card8.title: Web Programming
card8.body: Knowledge of SQL, C++/C#, Javascript, Html, Css and PHP with final project using everything learned.
